text: Guinea-Bissau has sent athletes to every Summer Olympic Games held since 1996, although the country has never won a medal. No athletes from Guinea-Bissau have competed in any Winter Olympic Games. The National Olympic Committee for Guinea-Bissau was formed in 1992. It was recognized by the International Olympic Committee in 1995. ==References== Category:Guinea-Bissau Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Guinea-Bissau at the Olympics
